Chinwe Ohajuruka bụ onye na-ewu ụlọ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke amụrụ na Naịjirịa. Ọ na-ekewa oge ya n'etiti Naịjirịa na Amerịka maka ọrụ. Ọ ghọrọ Sub-Saharan African Laureate maka Cartier Women's Initiative Awards na France n'afọ 2015 maka onyinye ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ dị ọnụ ala na azụmaahịa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.

Ohajuruka bụ CEO, Architect, Sustainability Consultant na Project Manager for Comprehensive Design Services, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ma na-ewu ụlọ dị ọnụ ala; ụlọ ọrụ ọ chọpụtara na 2012. Ụlọ ọrụ ya na-emepụta ụlọ site na iji usoro a na-akpọ Bio-Climatic Design, nke na-eji atụmatụ atụmatụ na usoro injinia nke dabara na ihu igwe obodo, ma tinye olulu mmiri na-eji anyanwụ eme ihe. O si Naịjirịa kwaga Amerịka n'afọ 2003.

A kpọrọ Ohajuruka "Great Energy Challenge Innovator" ma nye ya onyinye site na National Geographic maka ọrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Naijiria, Affordable housing with renewable energy for Nigeria. O nwetakwara ihe nrite sayensị na teknụzụ site na Chenving Foundation. E nyere ya Cartier Women's Initiative Award. Ụlọ ọrụ ya enwetala onyinye site na USAID na Western Union Foundation.
